content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Stoke City 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Stoke City 0.
Offside, Chelsea. Frank Lampard tries a through ball, but Nicolas Anelka is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Robert Huth (Stoke City) header from the left side of the six yard box is too high. Assisted by Liam Lawrence with a cross following a corner.
